typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		pk_trading_certificate as string,
		section as decimal(28,10),
		trading_certificate_type as string,
		dim_client_key as string,
		date_valid_to as date,
		object_key as string,
		dim_coverage_key as string,
		dm_number as decimal(28,10),
		date_valid_from as date,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		last_updated_by as string,
		inserted_by as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		dim_capital_branch_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> PreFactTradingCertificate
source(output(
		dim_coverage as long,
		cov_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimCoverage
source(output(
		ves_key as string,
		dim_current_vessel as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimCurrentVessel
source(output(
		prt_key as string,
		dim_partner as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimPartner
source(output(
		dim_capital_branch as long,
		bra_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimCapitalBranch
PreFactTradingCertificate, DimCoverage lookup(dim_coverage_key == cov_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lkpdimCoverage
lkpdimCoverage, DimCurrentVessel lookup(object_key == ves_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lkpdimCurrentVessel
lkpdimCurrentVessel, DimPartner lookup(dim_client_key == prt_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lkpdimPartner
lkpcapbranch alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> upsert
lkpdimPartner, DimCapitalBranch lookup(dim_capital_branch_key == bra_key,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lkpcapbranch
upsert sink(mapColumn(
		trading_certificate_key = pk_trading_certificate,
		trading_certificate_type,
		date_valid_to,
		dm_number,
		date_valid_from,
		dim_coverage,
		dim_current_vessel,
		dim_partner,
		dim_capital_branch
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FactTradingCertificate
